double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the next petal of flower a chain ◦ 2 turn repeat row a4 through row a7 two more times ◦ ◦ at this point flower a should have one petal with no slip stitches worked into it three petals with two slip stitches worked into each of them and two stitches with one slip_stitch each work into them 6 2 add a second
